members.name: supportedImageModes
members.description: The recording image sizes and formats supported by the device.

members.name: supportedAudioModes
members.description: The audio recording formats supported by the device.

members.name: supportedVideoModes
members.description: The recording video resolutions and formats supported by the device.

members.name: captureAudio
members.description: Start the audio recorder application and return information about captured audio clip files.

members.name: captureImage
members.description: Start the camera application and return information about captured image files.

members.name: captureVideo
members.description: Start the video recorder application and return information about captured video clip files.

members.name: onPendingCaptureResult
members.description: is fired if the capture call is successful

members.name: onPendingCaptureError
members.description: is fired if the capture call is unsuccessful
